  "Initiated By" : "STATE OF WEST VIRGINIA WEST VIRGINIA SECURITIES DIVISION",
  "Allegations" : "A REVIEW OF THE REGISTRATION FILES OF THE WEST VIRGINIA SECURITIES DIVISION DISCLOSED NO RECORD OF REGISTRATION FOR RESPONDENT HOFE AS A SECURITIES AGENT/DEALER IN THE STATE OF WEST VIRGINIA. RESPONDENT HOFE KNOWINGLY AND INTENTIONALLY INDUCED WEST VIRGINIA INVESTORS TO INVEST IN FRAUDULENT PROMISSORY NOTES WITH NO INTENT OF FULFILLING THE CONTRACTED AGREEMENTS.  CHAPTER 32, ARTICLE, SECTION 301 OF THE ACT PROVIDES THAT IT IS UNLAWFUL FOR ANY PERSON TO OFFER OR SELL ANY SECURITY IN THIS STATE UNLESS (1) IT IS REGISTERED UNDER THIS CHAPTER, OR (2) THE SECURITY OR TRANSACTION IS EXEMPTED UNDER SECTION 402. RESPONDENT HOFE IS NOT REGISTERED AS A SECURITIES AGENT/DEALER/OR BROKER IN THE STATE OF WEST VIRGINIA AND TRANSACTED BUSINESS AS A SECURITIES DEALER WITHOUT BENEFIT OF REGISTRATION IN VIOLATION OF LAW. THE COURSE OF BUSINESS ENGAGED IN BY RESPONDENT HOFE TO INDUCE THE PURCHASE OF ANNUITIES OPERATED AS FRAUD OR DECEIT ON WEST VIRGINIA RESIDENTS. RESPONDENT FAILE TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS RELATING TO RULE 506 EFFECTIVELY VOIDING THE FEDERAL EXEMPTION AND \"COVERED SECURITIES\" STATUS AFFORDED BY NSMIA. THEREFORE, RESPONDENT IS SUBJECT TO ALL PROVISIONS OF THE WEST VIRGINIA UNIFORM SECURITIES ACT, INCLUDING THE REGISTRATION REQUIREMENTS CONTAINED THEREIN AND WEST VIRGINIA ADMINISTRAVE RULE 15.06.",
  "Resolution" : "Order",
  "SanctionDetails" : [ ]
}
